page.title: 20Changing pattern in our area
page.content: Even though our area is a quiet,rural place,we noticed trends that seem to be countrywide.It's harder for people to get jobs,especially the young and most people have more leisure time.Young peope tend to stay on at school for longer or have to be satisfied with any job. Lots of new people,mainly older generation are moving into the cottages as they come up for sale and spending lots of money on doing them up. There doesn't seem to be such a sense of "The community" as there used to be. People are more mobile and look further afield for their leisure activities. More people work away from the village too,so Ellastone is becoming more of a cmmuter village,than a self sufficient community.It will be interesting to note the continued changes. By Class 4,Dove First School,Rocester.
